_comment: Multi-user GitHub identities configuration. Copy to identities.json and customize.
_usage: This file defines GitHub identities for multi-user workflows. Each identity has SSH, Git, and gh CLI settings.

_notes.git_email: Use GitHub's noreply email: Settings > Emails > 'Keep my email addresses private'
_notes.ssh_host_alias: Must match the Host entry in ~/.ssh/config
_notes.ssh_key_path: Tilde (~) is expanded to home directory automatically
